channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-11757] NFS gateway should shutdown when it can't start UDP or TCP server
item.description: Unlike the Portmap, Nfs3 class does shutdown when the service can't start.
item.summary: NFS gateway should shutdown when it can't start UDP or TCP server

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12707360/HDFS-7989.001.patch
against trunk revision 44809b8.

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. There were no new javadoc warning messages.

+1 eclipse:eclipse. The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-common-project/hadoop-nfs.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/10072//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/10072//console

This message is automatically generated.

It's kind of tricky to add unit tests. I manually tested it as the following:
1. start Linux native NFS server
2. try to start NFS Gateway. It couldn't bind the port and shutdowns itself as expected.

Uploaded a new patch to fix some class description.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12707589/HDFS-7989.002.patch
against trunk revision 61df1b2.

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. There were no new javadoc warning messages.

+1 eclipse:eclipse. The patch built with eclipse:eclipse.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in hadoop-common-project/hadoop-nfs.

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/10078//testReport/
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HDFS-Build/10078//console

Moved this JIRA form HDFS to COMMON since we only changed the common code.

against trunk revision 61df1b2.

Thanks for working on this, Brandon. The patch looks good to me. +1
I've committed the patch. Thank you, Jing, for the review.
